About the Company: DFM Foods Ltd. is engaged in the business of manufacturing, selling and marketing of packaged snack foods. Corn Rings and Wheat Puffs are marketed under the CRAX and NATKHAT brand names respectively. In the namkeens segment, the company offers a complete range of products consisting of distinct product variants that include Bhujiyas, Daals, Mixtures and Nut-Mixes. These are sold in several pack sizes to cater to both casual / impulse consumption as well as consumption at home.
